title: AI Content Flood
context: Generative AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Jasper) reduce the cost of content creation to near zero. Blogs, social posts, product descriptions, and SEO articles that once took hours now take minutes. Every company, marketer, and individual can now publish at scale. The internet is being flooded with machine-generated text that is grammatically correct, topically relevant, and utterly indistinguishable from each other.
hypothesis: AI content tools democratize publishing and help everyone communicate better.
